items.sentence: I\'d like to visit Boston at least one more time before I die.
I\'ve made an appointment to see the doctor on Monday at 2:30.
If I had 25% more income, I\'d be more satisfied with my life.
Tom managed to make time to visit Mary while he was in Boston.
Tom pays Mary three hundred dollars a week to clean his house.
Tom peeped in the window and saw that Mary was still sleeping.
Tom plans to get married as soon as he graduates from college.
Tom poured two glasses of orange juice and handed one to Mary.
You\'d be amazed how many times I\'ve told Tom not to do that.
According to Tom\'s will, Mary will inherit his entire estate.
